sentences.en: Bilateral free trade arrangements are permitted under conditions specified in the GATT articles.
sentences.cn: 根据“关贸总协定”规定的条件可以签订双边自由贸易协议.

sentences.en: Bilateral trade deals, food aid, and special preferences have further distorted trade flows in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 双边贸易交易, 粮食援助以及特惠措施使农产品贸易流量进一步遭到扭曲.

sentences.en: Calf diphtheria, is characterized by bilateral necrosis of the mucous membrane of the larynx.
sentences.cn: 犊白喉, 以喉粘膜的两侧性环死为特征.

sentences.en: China and the United States concluded [ entered into ] a bilateral trade agreement after long negotiations.
sentences.cn: 中美两国通过长期谈判后 订立 了一项双边贸易协定.

sentences.en: CMEA members have reverted to separate bilateral deals with lip service to multilateralism.
sentences.cn: 经互会成员国只是口头上侈谈多边贸易,实际上却已回复到各族的双边交易.

sentences.en: Our bilateral trade shows great promise for the future.
sentences.cn: 我们的双边贸易前景广阔.

sentences.en: Planetary nebulae are a type of isolated gaseous nebulae possessing a fair degree of bilateral symmetry.
sentences.cn: 行星状星云是一类孤立的气体星云,具有相当程度的双侧对称性.

sentences.en: Press contract provision provision, bilateral collaboration should last to next year summer.
sentences.cn: 按合同条款规定, 双方的合作要持续到明年夏季.

sentences.en: Proliferation of lymphocytes in lacrimal and salivary glands may cause bilateral painless enlargement.
sentences.cn: 泪腺和唾液腺淋巴细胞增生,可引起两侧腺体无痛性肿大.

sentences.en: Tax treaties are always bilateral , meaning they are agreements between two countries.
sentences.cn: 税务协定总是双方的.也就是说, 是两国之间一致达成的协议.

sentences.en: The accuracy was 89.7 % in 20 patients who had bilateral neck dissections.
sentences.cn: 在接受双侧颈淋巴清扫术的20名患者中其准确度为89.7%.

sentences.en: There was a wide gap between the views of the two statesmen on the bilateral cooperation.
sentences.cn: 对双方合作的问题,两位政治家各自所持的看法差距甚大.

sentences.en: They have been negotiating a bilateral trade deal.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在商谈一项双边贸易协定.

sentences.en: This is the basis on which our bilateral relations can and should continue to develop.
sentences.cn: 这是两国关系应得到继续发展,并可能得到继续发展的基础.

sentences.en: We are committed to joining with you to advance our many parallel strategic and bilateral interests.
sentences.cn: 我们决心同你们一道发展我们在战略和双边关系方面的许多并行不悖的利益.

words.tran_cn: 双边主义；两侧对称；互惠主义

trans.tran_cn: 双边的，（身体）两侧的，（大脑）两半球的
